item.description:
I have the Keep on the Shadowfell H1 4th edition adventure and plan to run the beginning of that adventure to help the DM's get more familiar with the new 4th edition rules.

***** Only RSVP to this meet-up if you are going to help run a table on Worldwide D&D Day on the 7th. *****

We need another 2 DM's to help us out so if you are interested RSVP here!
item.name: Worldwide D&D Day *** DM adventure day
